content: i just love ponchos i find them so comfortable to wear and love the way they can jazz up plain everyday outfits they are great over a strappy top or plain long sleeved t-shirt i used 1 200g cake of wolltraum she s a rainbow 760 metres of 4ply with a 4mm hook you could easily use any lightweight cotton yarn for this or even a 4-ply acrylic this is a one size pattern so you can adjust to make it larger or smaller should you need to the length from neckline to bottom edge is 25 inches/63 5cm the instructions are very simple and are in us terms
